faq.question: What is the functionality of this page?

faqlist.faq:
Every arena match, across all brackets and battlegroups, has a viewable Match Report. This report is a snapshot of the match summary that appears at the conclusion of the match in-game. Here is a rundown of the information and functionality contained in each Match Report:
View the combatants and their performance in the same five arena statistics as displayed in-game.
Team and player names are clickable and take you to their current profiles, unless the team no longer exists.
The top banner displays the team ratings and rating change for each team. The team ratings take the rating change of the current match into account.
Match start time and total length are displayed below the match statistics.

faq.question: Why do the killing blows not seem to add up in the match I’m viewing?

faqlist.faq: Some matches may end with the last member (or last few members) of the losing team choosing to /AFK out of the match to hasten the inevitable. In these cases, the winning team’s killing blows will total a number fewer than the total number of players on the other team.
